rows.label: bf11480100_0010
rows.name: What did you think?

rows.label: bf11480100_0020
rows.name: You mean, about him?

rows.label: bf11480100_0030
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: bf11480100_0035
rows.name:
In short, he's very human.
He protects his heart with a mask of lies.

rows.label: bf11480100_0040
rows.name: Curious about what's under the mask?

rows.label: bf11480100_0050
rows.name:
Not really.
All humans are like that, aren't they?

rows.label: bf11480100_0060
rows.name: You really hit where it hurts.

rows.label: bf11480100_0070
rows.name:
However, I hear his achievements
in the Acedia Holy See are quite something.

rows.label: bf11480100_0080
rows.name:
I also hear that the refugee protection policy
from last year was his doing.

rows.label: bf11480100_0090
rows.name:
Is that what you call a hypocrite?
Isn't he one of those?

rows.label: bf11480100_0100
rows.name: If only... that would be fine.

rows.label: bf11480100_0110
rows.name: He smiled. Did you see it?

rows.label: bf11480100_0120
rows.name: No.

rows.label: bf11480100_0130
rows.name: I think... he might actually be enjoying this.

rows.label: bf11480100_0140
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf11480100_0150
rows.name: The state of the world right now.

rows.label: bf11480100_0160
rows.name: Interesting.

rows.label: bf11480100_0170
rows.name:
You sensed that, didn't you?
That's why you made a point of having me meet him.

rows.label: bf11480100_0180
rows.name: You don't think they're worth saving?

rows.label: bf11480100_0190
rows.name:
If that is what you want to do,
I will cooperate.

rows.label: bf11480100_0200
rows.name: Even if you think they're not worthy?

rows.label: bf11480100_0210
rows.name: That's not for me to decide.

rows.label: bf11480100_0220
rows.name: It's up to you humans.
